1. annotati()¶

It permits you annotati specific types to a parameter

it raises an AnnotationError when type mismatch

import annotati as ann
@ann.annotati()
def add(a:int, b:int) -> int:
    return a+b

1.1. annotati.annotati(_raise:bool = True)¶

1.1.1. arguments¶

#.:py:_raise:bool

a bool determining if AnnotationError is to be raised on annotation mismatch
